front.title: BGP-4 over ATM and Proxy PAR

abstract.t: This draft specifes for BGP-4 implementors and users mechanisms describing how the protocol operates in ATM networks over PVC and SVC meshes with the presence of Proxy PAR. These recommendations do not require any protocol changes and allow for simpler, more efficient and cost-effective network designs. Proxy PAR can help to distribute changes of peer relationships when BGP-4 capable routers are reconfigured on the ATM cloud.
